description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Troyes vs Brest in the Coupe de France
title: Troyes vs Brest: Coupe de France stats & head-to-head
title_page: Troyes vs Brest: Coupe de France stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:

Attempt saved. Nicolas de Pr√©ville (Troyes) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner.
Goal!
Goal! Troyes 1, Brest 2. Abdallah Sima (Brest) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the top right corner. Assisted by Mathias Pereira Lage following a set piece situation.
Post
Attempt blocked. Ibrahim Salah (Brest) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ludovic Ajorque with a headed pass.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
